thread.title: Perrie Edwards not dating Joey Essex
thread.title_full: Perrie Edwards not dating Joey Essex - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Perrie Edwards not dating Joey Essex
text:
Singer Perrie Edwards is not currently dating TV celebrity and DJ Joey Essex despite a report which claimed that she's romancing him to get over her breakup with former One Direction star Zayn Malik.
READ: 'Single' Perrie Edwards having blast at nights out post split from Zayn
According to a report by published by the Daily Mirror, the Little Mix singer had several secret dates with the former The Only Way Is Essex star after they first met at in September.
For latest Music updates
Perrie was reportedly introduced to Joey at the awards event by friends. After their first meetup, the pair allegedly exchanged phone numbers.
 pictures updates
Responding to the report, a representative for the 'Black Magic' singer told dailymail.co.uk.: "Perrie is not dating Joey."
Furthermore, Perrie previously admitted that she's enjoying her single life.
Listen to Perrie Edwards on Gaana.com
"I'm having an absolute blast. We have a bit of banter with guys in nightclubs... I love it. I'm feeling brilliant and I'm in a good place."
WATCH: Little Mix on the Zayn Breakup, Performing with Taylor Swift
